name: Helping Hand
summary:
Helping Hand

An immersive VR experience that will challenge you with puzzles, tension and a creature to protect.

A Thrilling Adventure That Will Keep You on Edge

In Helping Hand, you find yourself trapped in a house haunted by dark entities. But you are not alone. A mysterious newborn creature desperately needs your help to survive. Your mission? Work together, solve puzzles and find a way to escape before the shadows lurking in the house catch you.

Solve Puzzles and Interact with the...
